title: The repairs to the non-tallying portion which forms part of common amenities such as toilet block, washing places, common passage, and staircase can be considered at Dy
clause_text: The repairs to the non-tallying portion which forms part of common amenities such as toilet block, washing places, common passage, and staircase can be considered at Dy. Ch. E (BP)'s level.
